# Siddhant Lad - Portfolio & Projects

> Co-Founder & CTO at Iris, backed by Y Combinator

## About

Siddhant Lad is a software engineer and entrepreneur, currently Co-Founder & CTO of Iris, a Y Combinator-backed personal assistant. His work focuses on AI, systems design, and rapid prototyping, building end-to-end products from mobile experiences to scalable backend systems.

He has built 12+ consumer apps with over 10K users, demonstrating expertise in full-stack development, mobile engineering, and product design.

## Current Project

### Iris - The Personal Assistant (Y Combinator W25)
- **Role**: Co-Founder & CTO
- **What**: Personal assistant that automates scheduling and email management through natural language commands
- **Tech**: React Native (iOS), Node.js, Natural Language Processing, Privacy-first architecture
- **Links**:
  - Portfolio page: https://siddhantlad.info/work/iris
  - YC Launch: https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/Omf-iris-the-personal-assistant
  - Demo video: https://youtu.be/lM8TqldYHXs

## Education

- **University of California, San Diego** - M.S. in Computer Science (Sept 2024 - 2025)
- **NMIMS University, Mumbai** - B.Tech in Computer Engineering (2020 - 2024)

## Featured Projects

### Safe Distancing
A predictive Android application leveraging DBSCAN and LSTM to forecast and visualize venue crowding in real-time. Designed to promote public safety during COVID-19.
- Link: https://siddhantlad.info/work/safe-distancing

### Workspace - Personal Productivity Platform
A custom-built workspace management app featuring project tracking, media galleries, blog writing, and resume editing. Built with Flutter and Firebase.
- Link: https://siddhantlad.info/work/workspace

### Sensor'D - Bluetooth Arcade Game with IoT Controller
Physical arcade car game controller using Arduino and Bluetooth HC05, integrated with a custom Android game built from scratch.
- Link: https://siddhantlad.info/work/sensord

## Technical Skills

- **Languages**: Python, Java, Kotlin, TypeScript
- **Frameworks**: React Native, Node.js, Astro, Flask
- **Tools & Platforms**: AWS, GCP, Docker, Git, Figma
- **Domains**: IoT, Computer Vision, Robotics, ML/DL, Mobile Apps

## Site Structure

- `/` - Home page with featured work
- `/work/` - Complete portfolio of projects
- `/about/` - Background, education, and skills
- `/work/[project]` - Individual project pages with details, galleries, and videos
